CustomField.description: Formula field checking two fields retuired to be set up when setting up a record for termination: Number_Porting_Specific_Date__c, Phone_no_Status__c
CustomField.formula: if( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Number_Porting_Specific_Date__c ) ), ISPICKVAL(Phone_no_Status__c, 'Opsigelse') ) ,'Yes','No')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Value Yes if the record is set to be terminated. For termination date look into Number Porting Specific Date field.
CustomField.label: Termination verifier
